name: 10x-architect
description: Auto-enhance prompts using the 10 Principles of Claude Code Design. Transform vague requests into precise, structured prompts with TDD, documentation, and SOLID principles.

hooks.command:
cat << 'EOF'
<10x-architect-enhancement>
You MUST follow these principles for this task:

1. GOAL CLARITY: Identify the clear goal and business value before starting
2. CONSTRAINTS: Define what NOT to do (at least 2-3 boundaries)
3. EXECUTION PHASES: Break work into 3-6 logical steps
4. TDD: Write tests FIRST (RED), then implement (GREEN), then refactor
5. DOCUMENTATION: Add JSDoc/docstrings to all functions
6. SOLID: Apply Single Responsibility, Open/Closed, Liskov, Interface Segregation, Dependency Inversion

Acknowledge you're following 10x Architect principles in your response.
</10x-architect-enhancement>
EOF
